name: Kawaiigochis
description:
Description:

Cute game about separtion, gaps, and splits

So this game is part of the https://itch.io/jam/gdevelop-game-jam-3

I Just had time for only three levels but i am planning to add more stuff near the future.

Also you can play it on https://liluo.io/notyourpenguin/kawaiigochis

It will take around 3 min to finish the game 

How to play

Follow the rules that appear on the screen.

Controls

ARROWS , X, A and MOUSE depends on the level.

Music by
